module.sqlWrap: SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM CrowdfundingLiked WHERE (PassportId=@PassportId) ORDER BY LikedId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM CrowdfundingLiked WHERE (CrowdfundingId=@CrowdfundingId) ORDER BY LikedId DESC
SELECT CrowdfundingId FROM CrowdfundingLiked WHERE (CrowdfundingId IN (@CrowdfundingIds)) AND (PassportId=@PassportId)

DELETE FROM CrowdfundingLiked WHERE CrowdfundingId=@CrowdfundingId AND PassportId=@PassportId UPDATE CrowdfundingCount SET LikedCount=(select count(1) from CrowdfundingLiked where CrowdfundingId=@CrowdfundingId) WHERE CrowdfundingId=@CrowdfundingId

declare @exist int declare @cid bigint INSERT INTO CrowdfundingLiked(CrowdfundingId,PassportId,UserId,CreatedTime) VALUES (@CrowdfundingId,@PassportId,@UserId,@CreatedTime) select @cid = @@IDENTITY begin select @exist=count(1) from CrowdfundingCount where CrowdfundingId=@CrowdfundingId if(@exist=0) begin insert CrowdfundingCount(CrowdfundingId,SupportCount,LikedCount,CommentCount,LastModifiedTime,CreatedTime) values(@CrowdfundingId,0,1,0,getdate(),getdate()) end else begin update CrowdfundingCount set LikedCount=(select count(1) from CrowdfundingLiked where CrowdfundingId=@CrowdfundingId),LastModifiedTime=getdate() where CrowdfundingId=@CrowdfundingId end end select @cid
